# Culture Attributes

- [Stable Attributes](#stable-attributes)
  - [culture.calendar](#culturecalendar)
  - [culture.display_name](#culturedisplay_name)
  - [culture.is_24_hour_format](#cultureis_24_hour_format)
  - [culture.locale](#culturelocale)
  - [culture.timezone](#culturetimezone)

## Stable Attributes

### culture.calendar

The calendar system used by the culture.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `GregorianCalendar` |

### culture.display_name

Human readable name of the culture.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `English (United States)` |

### culture.is_24_hour_format

Whether the culture uses 24-hour time format.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `boolean` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `true` |

### culture.locale

The locale identifier following RFC 4646.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `en-US` |

### culture.timezone

The timezone of the culture, as a geographic timezone identifier.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | maybe |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `Europe/Vienna` |
